title: 095: Adam's Road to the San Jose Pro: Week 2 Update
description: With just 3 weeks before the San Jose Pro, Adam goes to Las Vegas for a bachelor party. If anything is going to derail a fitness plan, it is a weekend in Vegas. How did Adam manage his diet and workouts while he was there? Did he get set back? If you have ever struggled or are struggling with temptation while moving towards your fitness goals, this episode let's you know what it takes to succeed.
